physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Well-circumscribed mass approximately 3x3x2 cm located at the laryngeal side of the left aryepiglottic fold, covering bilateral vocal cords and left pyriform sinus.
Wound healed well and patient regained normal swallowing ability within 2 weeks.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in swallowing ability and wound healing post-surgery.
